data.title: Obituary for FERN ANONA GRANT

data.text:
Anona Grant of Emmett, Idaho passed away May 3rd, 2016, at the age of 79. Anona was born to Thomas Daniel Jones and Fern King Jones, on May 3rd, 1937 in Inkom, Idaho.

Anona was preceded in death by her husband, Robert L. Grant and a daughter, Cindy Lou Boweman.

She is survived by her son, Robert D. (Karie Cross) Witherell of Boise; daughter, Dianne Witherell (Monty) Burbank of Healy, Alaska and son, Stan (Peggy) Witherell of Emmett; 3 brothers, 10 grandchildren, 9 great-grandchildren and numerous nieces and nephews. She was loved by all of them.

Funeral Services will be held on Saturday, May 7th, 2016 at 1:00 PM at Potter Funeral Chapel, 228 E Main, in Emmett, Idaho. Memorials may be made to Multiple Sclerosis Foundation or Breast Cancer Awareness.
